comments.author: MisanthropeRobot
comments.body: Berlin is not good anymore. It's too dirty. The rents are too high. Impossible to find an apartment anyway. The homeless and drug problems seem to be out of control. The public transport is getting worse. There is a perpetual war between car owners and bike riders both sides seem to be losing. The culture is being hit by a decrease in subsidies cuts. There seems to be an increase in ideologically motivated violence. So, yeah...
